artifacts.header: Transforming good intentions into tangible impacts.
artifacts.text: At INA ETHE, we believe in the power of generosity and financial sustainability. Join us in building a community that empowers non-profit organizations to thrive while offering individuals the opportunity to earn while making a difference. Together, let's create a brighter future.

content.title: Our Mission
content.text: At INA ETHE, our mission is twofold: we empower non-profit organizations to generate crucial income for their causes, while simultaneously providing individuals with the opportunity to earn while helping these causes thrive. We believe in the power of mutual benefit, creating a platform where generosity and financial sustainability coexist.

Join us in building a community that transforms good intentions into tangible impacts, ensuring a brighter future for both individuals and the non-profits they support. INA ETHE make a difference today!

elements.title: Impact
elements.text: Your subscription directly translates into meals for those in need.

elements.title: Transparency
elements.text: We offer complete transparency in our operations

elements.title: Community
elements.text: Join a passionate community of individuals dedicated to ending hunger in Africa.

content.title: Our Story
content.text: INA ETHE emerged in response to the African hunger crisis post-Covid. Starting with 'Food-On-Every-Table,' we sought aid from companies but faced silence. Adapting, we realized the need to address both hunger and South Africa's 40% unemployment.

content.title: Empowering Impactful Causes
content.text: INA ETHE is a unique platform uniting non-profits and individuals, offering a means for anyone with a worthy cause to generate income. Our resilient journey aims to make a lasting impact on hunger, unemployment, and funding challenges.

content.title: Our Story
content.text:
Our story at INA ETHE began in the aftermath of the Covid pandemic when a group of compassionate individuals, dismayed by the growing hunger crisis in Africa, took action. Starting the non-profit 'Food-On-Every-Table' we sought financial support from companies to address the urgent issue of hunger. However, the response was dishearteningly silent, prompting us to reassess our approach. 

 Recognizing the economic challenges faced by businesses, coupled with South Africa's staggering 40% unemployment rate, we understood the need for a sustainable solution that addressed both hunger and unemployment.

artifacts.text:
Moreover, as we delved deeper into the philanthropic landscape, we realized that other noteworthy causes were grappling with similar funding challenges. 

 In response, we developed a unique vehicle at INA ETHE, offering a means for anyone with a worthy cause to generate income, creating a versatile platform that empowers diverse initiatives. Out of this realization, INA ETHE emerged – a dynamic solution uniting non-profits and individuals, fostering a community where support and financial sustainability converge to create meaningful change. Our journey reflects the resilience born from adversity, as we strive to make a lasting impact on the lives of those facing hunger, unemployment, and a shortage of funding for their noble causes. 

 Join us in building a community that transforms good intentions into tangible impacts, ensuring a brighter future for both individuals and the non-profits they support. INA ETHE make a difference today!

INA ETHE is more than an initiative; it's a movement of compassion, driven by the belief that change is possible when people come together. Whether you're interested in subscribing, volunteering, or partnering with us, we invite you to be a part of our journey.

content.title: How the Help’em system works
content.text:
When you join as a subscriber, you become a Hope Builder, and the process is straightforward: 
• Your recruits contribute a monthly subscription fee, determined by their chosen package. 
• You earn a 40% Monthly Income per Recruit from the monthly subscription fee of each person you bring on board. 
• Another 40% of the subscription fee is directed towards the cause chosen by your recruit or subscriber. 
• The remaining 20% is allocated to sustaining, advancing, and continually improving the INA ETHE system. 
• Your subscription extends beyond a mere commitment; it embodies a promise of hope. Join us today and be a part of creating a world where we can collectively contribute to each other's well-being.

artifacts.title: Our Values
artifacts.text: At INA ETHE, our values serve as our guiding light. They include 'compassion', 'transparency,' 'collaboration,' and these principles underpin everything we do. We take pride in our commitment to complete transparency in our operations, ensuring that every contribution makes a meaningful impact.

artifacts.title: Meet our team
artifacts.text: Our success is a testament to the dedication and passion of our team. Meet the individuals who drive INA ETHE forward, from our founders to our committed volunteers. Together, we share a common goal - to eradicate hunger in Africa and to bring hope to those who need it most.

Join us in making a difference. Every step we take brings us closer to a brighter future. Together, we're transforming lives, building communities, and leaving a lasting legacy of compassion and change.

Discover INA ETHE, a unique vehicle empowering anyone with a noble cause to generate income. Our platform is a versatile solution that unites non-profits and individuals, fostering a community where support and financial sustainability converge for meaningful change. Join us in this journey of resilience as we strive to make a lasting impact on lives affected by hunger, unemployment, and insufficient funding for noble causes.

artifacts.title: Our Mission
artifacts.text: At INA ETHE, our mission is twofold: we empower non-profit organizations to generate crucial income for their causes, while simultaneously providing individuals with the opportunity to earn while helping these causes thrive. We believe in the power of mutual benefit, creating a platform where generosity and financial sustainability coexist.

artifacts.title: Our Vision
artifacts.text: Our vision at INA ETHE is to create a world where we can collectively contribute to each other's well-being. We envision a future where individuals and non-profits come together to create meaningful change, fostering a community that empowers everyone to make a difference.

artifacts.title: Our Values
artifacts.text: At INA ETHE, our values serve as our guiding light. They include 'compassion', 'transparency,' 'collaboration,' and these principles underpin everything we do. We take pride in our commitment to complete transparency in our operations, ensuring that every contribution makes a meaningful impact.

artifacts.title: Our Impact
artifacts.text: Your subscription directly translates into meals for those in need. We offer complete transparency in our operations, and we invite you to join a passionate community of individuals dedicated to ending hunger in Africa.

artifacts.title: Your Information Is Saved:
artifacts.text: Your details have been securely saved to our database, ensuring a seamless experience as you embark on your journey of giving back. Rest assured, your support is in good hands.

artifacts.title: Make Your First Donation
artifacts.text: It's time to turn your commitment into action! Click the button below to make your first donation to the non-profit organization you've subscribed to. Every contribution, no matter the size, has the power to create positive change.

artifacts.title: Impact in Motion
artifacts.text: With your generosity, you're helping to fund critical projects, support essential services, and make a tangible difference in communities worldwide. Thank you for taking this crucial step toward building a better future for all.
Take pride in knowing that your contribution is making a meaningful impact. Let's continue to spread hope, kindness, and compassion together!

artifacts.title: Thank You for Joining the InaEthe Community!
artifacts.text: Welcome aboard! Your support means the world to us and the non-profit organization you've chosen to subscribe to. Together, we're making a difference and creating positive change in the world.

artifacts.title: Your Impact Matters!
artifacts.text: Your subscription isn't just a transaction—it's a powerful commitment to making a difference. With your support, we're empowering non-profits to create lasting change and improve lives around the world.

artifacts.title: Stay Connected!
artifacts.text: Keep an eye on your inbox for updates, exclusive content, and opportunities to further engage with the organization you've subscribed to. Together, we'll continue to build a brighter future and make a difference in the lives of those who need it most.

artifacts.title: Payment Unsuccessful
artifacts.text: We're sorry to hear that your payment was unsuccessful. Please try again or contact us if you need assistance. Your support is crucial to the non-profit organization you've chosen to subscribe to, and we're here to help you every step of the way.
